about_the_game:
Adorned with shops, a river, and new townsfolk Grand Amnis has never felt more alive with this brand-new area! When exploring this new area, Iris and you discover a mysterious shop. Enchanted by its offerings, Iris is drawn in to learn more about its wares and terrifying shopkeeper….

The Warrior and the Tailor is a brand new side story and expansion for RUINSMAGUS. After facing a unique boss, players can unlock new costumes for Iris. Are you up for the challenge?

The DLC contains:
  • An accessible brand-new area after completing Chapter 5.
  • 9 new headwear for Iris
  • 5 new costumes for Iris
  • A brand new side story
  • A challenging new boss battle
